articles.title: Durand Cup 2023: Mumbai City FC thump Jamshedpur FC; FC Goa hit six past Shillong Lajong - Indian Super League
articles.description: The Indian Super League (ISL) Champions continued their winning run in style, romping to a 5-0 victory against Jamshedpur FC in the Durand Cup 2023 at the Vivekananda Yuba Bharati Krirangan in Kolkata on Tuesday.
